author: Alexandra Kelley
title: Las Vegas mayor wants to reopen city businesses, assuming 'everybody is a carrier' of the coronavirus | TheHill - The Hill
description: Las Vegas mayor wants to reopen city businesses, assuming 'everybody is a carrier' of the coronavirus | TheHill  The Hill
content:
After calling the lockdown of nonessential businesses in Nevada total insanity, the mayor of Las Vegas said on Tuesday that she intends to reopen the strips famous casinos assuming everyone is infected with the coronavirus.
Speaking with Katy Tur on MSNBC, I… [+3216 chars]
